author: IGN
description: The DCU rolls on with Supergirl in 2026 and the first trailer is here! Woman of Tomorrow and dog-mom to Krypto, Kara Zor-El brought us our first look at her solo outing after the surprise cameo in Superman. James Gunn and director Craig Gillespie are leaning into western vibes for Kara's story, drawing on everything from True Grit to a famous DC Comics run. Here's everybody we saw in the new trailer, an appearance of Jason Momoa as Lobo, and what it all might mean for the DCU at large and the Superman follow up for 2027, Man of Tomorrow. Here's Who's Who in the New Supergirl Trailer!
title: Who's Who in the New Supergirl Trailer

author: IGN
description:
In today's Daily Fix:
Tonight is The Game Awards, and with it we can expect a deluge of new announcements and surprises. But a few surprises have already leaked onto the internet, including what look like the first images from the upcoming Tomb Raider remake. The remake will be a top-to-bottom retelling of the original game from 1996, but it will be set in the same continuity as the Tomb Raider Survivor trilogy that began in 2011. Another major leak is the reveal of the villain in the upcoming 007 First Light game. The villain, Bawma, will be played by Lenny Kravitz. And in other news, Helldivers 2 dev Arrowhead has teased a roguelite mode, but don't get your hopes up. It's still in its early stages and may never actually get released.

Presented by Universal Orlando Resort.

#IGN #Gaming
title: Tomb Raider, 007 First Light Details Leak Ahead of The Game Awards - IGN Daily Fix

author: IGN
description:
Meet Bloomreaper the Invincible. Watch the latest Borderlands 4 trailer for the first-person looter shooter game to see this first Raid Boss in action. Bloomreaper the Invincible is available to access after completing the main campaign. You must also visit the Raid Board in any of our three faction hubs, and being at level 50 is encouraged but not required. Bloomreaper the Invincible is available now for free for all players in Borderlands 4. Borderlands 4 is out now on PC, Xbox Series X/S, and PlayStation 5 (PS5).

Bloomreaper the Invincible is a corrupted god who lures surface dwellers into the depths of the abyss where their corpses feed its roots. This towering creep poses the ultimate challenge to any Vault Hunter, pushing your build and skills to the max.

The new timed challenge system means the faster you take it down, the better the loot. Kill Bloomreaper quick enough for a chance to earn nine new Legendaries that you can farm as dedicated drops: five new pieces of gear and
title: Borderlands 4 - Official Bloomreaper the Invincible Boss Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Unbeatable reviewed by Gabriel Moss on PC. also available on PlayStation 5 and Xbox Series X|S.

Unbeatable suffers from an identity crisis, burying its functional but shallow rhythm gameplay beneath disjointed conversations and uneven pacing. While the visual style is genuinely striking, it is frequently undermined by confusing camera work, with the execution of this "punk rock dystopia" vision suffering from a lack of disciplined editing. The heartfelt story does eventually coalesce into something genuinely touching – but getting there requires patience, with repetitive dialogue and awkward transitions padding out that path. Rhythm fans seeking tight, focused gameplay could still find something to enjoy in the high score chase and rocking soundtrack of its arcade mode – but if that’s what you’re after, the story mode is probably worth skipping entirely.

#IGN #Gaming
title: Unbeatable Review

author: IGN
description:
Check out the latest Lords of the Fallen trailer for the action RPG to see what to expect in the Version 2.5 update, which brings reworks to enemy and boss behavior across both Legacy and the all-new Veteran Mode. The Version 2.5 update for Lords of the Fallen is available now on PC, Xbox Series X/S, and PlayStation 5 (PS5).

The Version 2.5 update features updates to bosses and enemies to increase the soulslike challenge. Bosses like Pieta feature refined combos and increased moveset variation, while the Congregator of Flesh has received less staggering and tighter pacing. Mini-bosses will pressure players further with faster attacks, smarter positioning, and cooldown logic, while normal enemies go a step further with a new global cooldown system adding to their aggression, alongside faster spell recovery, and reduced attack distance.

The update also brings Veteran Mode, which is an ultimate test of skill and endurance. Many of Mournstead’s bosses have been further empowered with fa
title: Lords of the Fallen (2023) - Official Version 2.5 Update Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Check out this clip from King Ivory, an upcoming action thriller movie starring James Badge Dale, Ben Foster, Michael Mando, Rory Cochrane, Ritchie Coster, George Carroll with Graham Green, Melissa Leo, and Sam Quartin.

From civilians to criminals to addicts to law enforcement, and everyone in between, all walks of life intersect in this thriller about the epidemic that is fentanyl; street name: King Ivory. It is business as usual for Tulsa drug cop, Layne West (James Badge Dale), battling the local criminal element, which hits too close to home when his son, Jack (Jasper Jones), gets hooked on fentanyl. In conjunction with his partner, Ty (George Carroll), and FBI counterpart, Beatty (Rory Cochrane), West makes it his mission in life to take down those responsible, including the Mexican cartel’s local shot-caller, Ramón Garza (Michael Mando), Indian Brotherhood War Chief, Holt Lightfeather (Graham Greene), who controls state-wide trafficking while serving life inside the Oklahoma St
title: King Ivory - Official 'Keep Fighting' Clip

author: IGN
description:
Check out the Supergirl teaser trailer for this upcoming DCU film starring Milly Alcock in the dual role of Supergirl/Kara Zor-El. The film also stars Matthias Schoenaerts, Eve Ridley, David Krumholtz, Emily Beecham, and Jason Momoa.
When an unexpected and ruthless adversary strikes too close to home, Kara Zor-El, aka Supergirl, reluctantly joins forces with an unlikely companion on an epic, interstellar journey of vengeance and justice.
Craig Gillespie directs the film from a screenplay by Ana Nogueira.
DC Studios heads Peter Safran and James Gunn are producing the film, which is based on characters from DC, Supergirl based on characters created by Jerry Siegel and Joe Shuster. The film is executive produced by Nigel Gostelow, Chantal Nong Vo and Lars P. Winther.
Behind the camera, Gillespie is joined by director of photography Rob Hardy, production designer Neil Lamont, editor Tatiana S. Riegel, costume designer Anna B. Sheppard, Visual Effects Supervisor Geoffrey Baumann, and compo
title: Supergirl - Official Teaser Trailer (2026) Milly Alcock, Jason Momoa

author: IGN
description:
A remote village in Roman-era Egypt explodes into spiritual warfare when a carpenter, his wife and their child are targeted by supernatural forces in The Carpenter’s Son. Joseph (Nicolas Cage), Mary (FKA twigs) and their teenage son Jesus (Noah Jupe) have lived for years under threat, clinging to their faith and traditions. But a stopover in a small settlement unleashes growing chaos when a mysterious stranger (Isla Johnston) tries to entice young Jesus to abandon his devout father’s rules. 

With every pull of temptation, the boy is lured into a forbidden world, as a terrified Joseph realizes that a demonic power is at work. Violent, unnatural events inexplicably follow Jesus, and he begins to experience nightmarish visions of the future. Finally, he learns the fearsome truth about his new playmate, as well as the child’s real name: Satan. 

Writer and director Lotfy Nathan, drawing from his Coptic Christian background, delivers a meticulously crafted, genre-bending supernatural thri
title: The Carpenter's Son - Exclusive Clip (2025) Noah Jupe

author: IGN
description:
With the release of the Forsaken Hollows DLC came two new nightfarers to Elden Ring Nightreign: The Arcane-Enthused Scholar and the Darkness Vampire Combat Nun, Undertaker. Both come with their own remembrance quests, and completing the Undertaker’s will earn you several relics, a chalice, and the Undertaker’s Remembrance Outfit. Let’s go through step-by-step how to complete the Undertaker’s Remembrance questline. 
Timecodes
0:00 - Intro
0:26 - Step-by-Step Directions (Take Picture)
0:41 - Unlock Undertaker and Scholar
1:53 - Unlock the First 3 Journals/Memory Fragments
2:14 - 1st Remembrance Quest, Defeat Other Nightfarers (Journal Page 3)
3:58 - Unlock Journal Page 5
4:25 - 2nd Remembrance Quest, Find the Scholar (Journal Page 5)
7:17 - Defeat Night Aspect and Drop Dismembered Finger
8:15 - Remembrance Rewards
title: Elden Ring Nightreign - Undertaker Remembrance Guide (Forsaken Hollows DLC)

author: IGN
description:
Searching for the Bard’s Lost Guitar in The Forge? This side quest starts in Stonewake’s Cross, but the Bard gives you absolutely no clues about where to begin. In this guide, we’ll show you the exact path to the hidden cave, where to find the missing guitar, and how to use the Unknown Key he gives you afterward.

We’ll walk you step-by-step from the Bard’s campsite to the secret cave entrance hidden behind greenery near The Cave. Once inside, you’ll discover the undead NPC guarding the guitar. Returning it to the Bard earns you the Unknown Key — but he won’t tell you what it unlocks.
We explain how to use the Unknown Key, where to find the locked gate in The Cave, and how to reach the Fallen Angel’s Cave where the Arcane Pickaxe awaits. It costs 150,000 Gold, but with a massive +50% Luck bonus, it’s one of the best pickaxes in The Forge.

For more walkthroughs, money-making guides, hidden secrets, and The Forge tips, check out the full IGN wiki.

The Forge Wiki: https://www.ign.com/w
title: The Forge: How to Find the Bard’s Lost Guitar & Use the Unknown Key (Secret Cave Guide)

author: IGN
description: Don't miss the Launch Trailer for Bluey's Quest for the Gold Pen, an adventure game based on the hit animated series developed by Halfbrick Studios. Players will explore nine-drawn levels from snowy mountains, golden beaches, lush green forests, and iconic Australian landscapes as a drawn version of Bluey. Overcome obstacles, solve puzzles, and help Bluey and Bingoose retrieve The Gold Pen from King Goldie Horns. Bluey's Quest for the Gold Pen is available now for iOS and macOS, with the game launching on PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X|S, Nintendo Switch, Nintendo Switch 2, and PC (Steam).
title: Bluey's Quest for the Gold Pen - Official Launch Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Changing your class in The Forge isn’t as simple as picking the one you want — it all comes down to rerolls and luck. In this guide, we break down every method you can use to reroll your race so you can chase powerful classes like the Minotaur or Demon.

We’ll walk you through your first opportunity to change class after meeting Sensei Moro, how to reroll later using the Wizard in Stonewake’s Cross, and how to access the Reroll menu directly from the in-game Shop. We also explain how to get more rerolls — whether through limited-time codes or by purchasing them with Robux.

If you’re trying to build the perfect character, this guide will show you every way to switch classes in The Forge. For more tips, hidden secrets, money-making guides, and progression help, be sure to check out the full IGN wiki.

The Forge Wiki: https://www.ign.com/wikis/the-forge
The Forge Codes Pages: https://www.ign.com/articles/the-forge-codes

#Roblox #TheForge #IGN
title: The Forge Reroll Guide – How to Change Class, Unlock New Races, and Get More Rerolls

author: IGN
description:
Astra Malorum is the second round-based Zombies map in Black Ops 7, arriving with Season 1, and this is your complete, step-by-step walkthrough of the entire Easter Egg main quest.

From repairing the Harmonic Oculus, upgrading to the LGM-1 Wonder Weapon, solving the planetary alignment puzzles, unlocking the Cryo Chamber, collecting Dr. Thurston’s brain, navigating the portal to Mars, and finally taking down Caltheris across all four phases of this marathon boss fight – this guide covers every mechanic, puzzle, code, trap, and strategy you’ll need.
title: Call of Duty: Black Ops 7 Zombies – Astra Malorum Full Main Quest Guide (Season 1)
